official_title: To amend the Homeowners Protection Act of 1998 to increase consumer protections relating to cancellation of private mortgage insurance.
short_title: Private Mortgage Insurance Cancellation Simplification Act of 1998

summary.text: Private Mortgage Insurance Cancellation Simplification Act of 1998 - Amends the Homeowners Protection Act of 1998 to apply the borrower termination and automatic cancellation provisions to high-risk loans. Provides that, other than with respect to inconsistencies, such Act does not affect compliance with State laws regarding private residential mortgage insurance.
